title: type recommendation
content:
I am looking for a type that closely resembles the "ICE CREAM" in these pictures. Something stern

thanks.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [2953953460\_8516f20f33.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045753/http:/typophile.com/files/2953953460_8516f20f33.jpg) | 137.94 KB |
| [birite.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045753/http:/typophile.com/files/birite.jpg) | 32.71 KB |
author: designtn

comments.content:
How about [Mingo Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045753/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/spiecegraphics/mingo-gothic-sg/)? You could add stroke to make it bolder, if necessary. I also think Jason Walcott (at Veer) has some Moderne styles.

- Mike Yanega

Also [the FF Moderne Gothics](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020045753/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_moderne_gothics/?&sample_text=ICE%20CREAM) family has some good choices.

- Mike Yanega
